bibl.title: Some Neglected Papyri Evidence Against the Authenticity of Iliad 16.381.
bibl.note: Three papyri omit line 381: 1. Brit. Mus. Add. MS 17210 [= P. Lond. Inv. Add. Ms. 17210] (Syriac Palimpsest); 2. [P. Coll. privées:] P. Morgan (= Pack2 870); 3. P. Rainer III, 4 (Inv. 30485) (= Pack2 933).
bibl.seg: APTHORP M.J., Some Neglected Papyri Evidence Against the Authenticity of Iliad 16.381.

Three papyri omit line 381: 1. Brit. Mus. Add. MS 17210 [= P. Lond. Inv. Add. Ms. 17210] (Syriac Palimpsest); 2. [P. Coll. privées:] P. Morgan (= Pack2 870); 3. P. Rainer III, 4 (Inv. 30485) (= Pack2 933).
